interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Taya Beauty Inner Core Hair Strong Anti-Breakage Shampoo & Conditioner Duo - Strengthening and Repairing Formula - Free From Sulfates and Parabens - 8 fl oz Bottles
Review Date: 2020/02/23
Store: TAYA I AM.
Product Description: ['INNER CORE SHAMPOO: Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Acrylates Copolymer, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Panthenol, Dimethicone, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-11, Laureth-4, Laureth-23, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Amodimethicone, Cocamide MIPA, Trideceth-12, Kaolin, Polysorbate 20, Fragrance/Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Coconut Acid, Sodium Methyltaurate, Isopropanolamine, Tocopherol, Salicylic Acid, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool. INNER CORE CONDITIONER: Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Polysorbate 60, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Divinyldimethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Polyquaternium-37, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-7, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Cetyl Alcohol, Trideceth-12, C11-15 Pareth-7, C12-13 Pareth-23, C12-13 Pareth-3, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-90M, Tetrasodium EDTA, Buteth-3, C10-40 Isoalkylamidopropylethyldimonium Ethosulfate, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Laureth-9, Tributyl Citrate, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Kaolin, Yellow 6/CI 15985, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Oleate, Acrylates/Stearyl Methacrylate Copolymer, C10-11 Isoparaffin, Isopropyl Alcohol, Trisodium HEDTA, Silica, BHT, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool.']
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Repairing,Cleanses,Breakage', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'TAYA I AM.', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Color Treated, Curly, Damaged, Thin', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.53 x 2.09 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '3.00', 'UPC': '858308002185'}
Review Text: I was able to get the conditioner bottle open, but not the shampoo.  The bottles have an interesting opening mechanism.  You turn the top and squeeze the product out through a mesh hole on the top.  Unfortunately, the top on our shampoo bottle is defective and none of us can get it open.  The conditioner is very nice though.  It is thick and smooth and detangles well.  It also smells nice.
Review Title: Shampoo bottle won't open
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Body Scrubs for Women Premium Organic Nimiah Exfoliating Body Scrub with Activated Bamboo Charcoal Natural Salt Exfoliator Scrubs for Body Foot Hand Skin Care Nimiah {'Brand': 'Nimiah', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Use for': 'Hands, Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '2.7 x 2.7 x 2.1 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242919810'} Pros:

*The scrub is really good at exfoliating skin;
*After a week of daily use of this scrub, my skin is noticeably softer and brighter;
*It is kind of fun to use because it feels/looks like you are rubbing dirt all over your body;
*The jar is small but a little goes a long way.

Cons:
*The charcoal scrub is a bit messy if you are not careful. I have to quickly rinse my shower after each use because the stuff has flicked everywhere. Great scrub Way Of Will Sweet Orange Body Wash, Moisturizing Body Wash with Sweet Orange Essential Oil, Body Wash for Women and Men, Paraben and Sulfate Free, 120 mL Way Of Will {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Oily,All Skin Types', 'Brand': 'Way Of Will', 'Scent': 'Sweet Orange', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben,Sulfate Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '840652000191'} (Reviewed by my wife): I did not expect to like this sweet orange essential oil body wash (It's orange!). It smells heavenly. The scent is a mood lifter as described. The body wash leaves my skin soft and smooth.

The bottle is surprisingly small, but a little goes a long way. Orange scent is heavenly Splendora Sugar Lip Scrub - Peach - (20g / 0.7oz.) Splendora {'Brand': 'Splendora', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '1.73 x 1.73 x 1.34 inches; 0.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '736640550444'} (Reviewed by my wife): This lip scrub smells great and tastes great. You are supposed to rinse off the scrub after rubbing it in, but it tasted so good that I found myself licking the peachy sugar off. The directions are very simple, just put a bit of scrub on your lips and rub them in for about 30 seconds, then rinse off. My lips are visibly smoother after using this product. The jar is small, but a little goes a long way so I'll be making this last. Smells great, tastes great Lip MOISTURIZER by MERLOTSPF15 - Intense Therapy Lip Moisturizer - Grape Seed Infused - for Healing Dry, Chapped Lips. Made with Beeswax, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E - Color FreeSPF 15 Merlot {'Package Dimensions': '2.71 x 1.57 x 0.59 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} This is a very nice lip moisturizer. It goes on clear and softens and moisturizes your lips. There is no scent or flavoring. The moisturizer provides sun protection. Leaves lips soft and protected from the sun Taya Beauty Inner Core Hair Strong Anti-Breakage Shampoo & Conditioner Duo - Strengthening and Repairing Formula - Free From Sulfates and Parabens - 8 fl oz Bottles TAYA I AM. profile:
The user maintains a strong emphasis on body care, particularly prioritizing effective exfoliation, moisturizing solutions, and now lip care for healing dry, chapped lips. They actively seek products suitable for dry skin, favoring organic materials and certified ingredients while being consistent in their preference for natural formulations. While they typically enjoy products that enhance sensory experiences, the latest interaction with a hair care duo reveals a growing flexibility towards functionality, particularly when the effectiveness is clear, even in the absence of appealing scents.

They place paramount importance on product functionality, especially those that provide protection and visibly improve texture and comfort with minimal application. The recent interaction involved a challenging experience with a shampoo bottle, which may indicate the user values user-friendly packaging alongside product performance. However, they did find the conditioner effective, aligning with their appreciation for efficient solutions.

Overall, the user seeks practical, effective skincare and hair care solutions that cater to specific needs while valuing tactile experiences. Their preferences reflect a balance between enjoyment and practicality, with an increasing inclination toward products that deliver measurable results over mere sensory appeal. This adaptability highlights a nuanced approach to beauty and self-care, focusing on both efficacy and user experience.
